message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper deals with the task of image captioning, which involves generating natural language descriptions of images. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses image features as input, which suggests that it could belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision). The proposed method involves learning a latent space for every word position, which is a novel approach to modeling language, and could be of interest to researchers in cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach using metrics related to diversity and sentence quality, which could also make it relevant to researchers in cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
